verses.verse: And he <S%G450>arose<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> and <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3725>coasts<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> by the <S%G4008>farther<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> of <S%G2446>Jordan:<s%> and the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4848>resort<s%> to him <S%G3825>again;<s%> and, as he was <S%G1486>wont,<s%> he <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G3825>again.<s%>

And in the <S%G3614>house<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him <S%G3825>again<s%> of the <S%G846>same<s%> matter.

And he <S%G1723>took<s%> them up in his <S%G1723>arms,<s%> <S%G5087>put<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on them, and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> them.
